item.title: The House Hot Sheet for Week 4 of the 2025 Legislative Session – Washington State House Democrats
item.description: News article "The House Hot Sheet for Week 4 of the 2025 Legislative Session – Washington State House Democrats" from House Democrats.

item.title: 👎Erin Seeberger - Washington Defense Trial Lawyers
item.description: Erin Seeberger signed up to testify Con. They are signed up to represent Washington Defense Trial Lawyers.

item.title: 👎Katie Kolan - Washington State Hospital Association
item.description: Katie Kolan signed up to testify Con. They are signed up to represent Washington State Hospital Association.

item.title: 👎Martha Raymond - MultiCare Health System
item.description: Martha Raymond signed up to testify Con. They are signed up to represent MultiCare Health System.

item.title: 👎💵Emily Wittman - Association of Washington Business
item.description: Emily Wittman signed up to testify Con. They are signed up to represent Association of Washington Business. They are a registered lobbyist.

item.title: 👎💵Katherine Mahoney - LeadingAge Washington
item.description: Katherine Mahoney signed up to testify Con. They are signed up to represent LeadingAge Washington. They are a registered lobbyist.

item.title: 👎Kris Teft - Washington Liability Reform Coalition
item.description: Kris Teft signed up to testify Con. They are signed up to represent Washington Liability Reform Coalition.

item.title: 👎Jennifer Hanscom - Washington State Medical Association
item.description: Jennifer Hanscom signed up to testify Con. They are signed up to represent Washington State Medical Association.

item.title: 👍Colleen Durkin Peterson - Washington State Association for Justice
item.description: Colleen Durkin Peterson signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent Washington State Association for Justice.

item.title: 👍Nate Roberts - Washington State Association for Justice
item.description: Nate Roberts signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent Washington State Association for Justice.
